description: A simple recipe that kids will love and can get involved making them.
keywords: Cupcake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Ice Cream Cone Cupcakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare a 12 cupcake tin and place 12 ice cream cones in the tin.
Cream the butter and sugar until it is light and creamy.
Gradually add eggs one at a time and beat well.
Gradually fold in the sifted flour until you get a smooth consistency.
Fill each cone evenly with mixture and bake in a preheated oven at 160Â°C for 15-20 minutes. Remove from tin and place on a cooling rack.
In the meantime prepare icing sugar by using a small bowl and add water to form a smooth consistency. Top with sprinkles and enjoy!
